attn_node.name: PBAO_FIR
attn_node.bit: OCI Address Parity Error Det
PBA OCI Slave Initialization Error
OCI Write Data Parity Error Detected
Spare -was OCI Re-Request Timeout
BCUE Setup Error
BCUE Read Data Parity Error OR MRDERR Asserted
BCDE Setup Error
BCDE Write Data error indicated by OCI Slave
Internal Logic Error. See PBAERRRPT2 for more detailed information.
Illegal access to OCI Register. Invalid address, read to write-only, write to read-only.
Push Write Error. Push queue did not get OCI ADDRACK for push write request. Either the address is invalid or the targeted detected and address
Push Write Error. Push queue did not get OCI ADDRACK for push write request. Either the address is invalid or the targeted detected and address
Illegal PBAX Flow. See PBAERRRPT2 for more info.
Illegal PBAX Flow. See PBAERRRPT2 for more info.
PBAXSND Reservation Error. Reservation request and Reservations not enabled, push queue not enabled, or push queue is full.
PBAXISND Reservation Error. Reservation request and Reservations not enabled, push queue not enabled, or push queue is full.
The htm fifo interface was not able to keep up with the frequency variation between PBAO and PBAF and has overflowed and lost htm trace records.
The PBA has been configured to use the PowerBus Topology Translate tables, and the request did not hit a valid entry.
